alert.note: Alert for Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Southeast Pinal County including Kearny, Mammoth, Oracle (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 3:35PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Pinal County through 415 PM MST... At 335 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dudleyville, or 9 miles southeast of Winkelman, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mammoth, Dudleyville and Aravaipa Canyon Wilderness. This includes Route 77 between mile markers 114 and 134. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Southeast Pinal County including Kearny, Mammoth, Oracle
